GSD.description:
lockdown: also lock down previous kgdb use

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.10 by commit 281d356a035132f2603724ee0f04767d70e2e98e. For more details please see the references link.
